info.name: TechnicalTestApplication Copy
info.description:
# Introduction
The purpose of this API is to create users and to visualize the users created

# Overview
There are two routes on this API,
the first one /users which allows to create new user, it is necessary to give him a user of this type :
{
    "username": "test",
    "gender": {
        "gender": "male"
    },
    "country": {
        "country": "France"
    },
    "phone": null,
    "birthdate": "2000-08-14T23:18:14.337Z"
}

The second /users/{id} allows to retrieve a user thanks to its id

# Error Codes

400 : Null parameters are not allowed
400 : You must be of legal age
400 : You must be in France
400 : Only male / female / other or empty are allow for gender 400 : Username already exist
400 : Invalid phone number
400	: Invalid UserId
404	: Service not found
500	: Server error
